name: decentralized-dns
description: A recursive DNS resolver with token-based tolls for subsidizing decentralized Web3/IPFS gateway capacity.

scripts.mvp:demo:devnet: npm -C solana ci --include=dev && npm -C solana run devnet:verify && npm -C solana run devnet:audit
scripts.miner:cf:deploy: cd services/cf-worker-miner && npm i && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.miner:cf:dev: cd services/cf-worker-miner && npm i && npx wrangler dev
